text: Pen chɨn takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak mɨdupsek kɨdek ma gɨl, God chɨnop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab. Klays pen chɨnop dɨl agak, Yad tep kɨlop ak dɨl, bɨ tɨmel tek olap mɨden, yɨp gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨmuŋ agak. Buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl agɨlak, Bɨ mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumub okok, God kɨlop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gup agɨl tɨkɨlak. Anɨb ak chɨn nopun, chɨn yul awl dɨnɨg gon, Klays tep chɨnop ak dɨl, yul awl anɨb ak dɨl kumak.
